Meteara: I agree. Use all force necessary.

She boosted her jets and flew faster. That ship had to be brought down 
at any cost.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He shakes his head.  "Not entirely, no.  But it doesn't sound 
good.  
> Let's go take down that ship."  He nods confidently.  "If we can 
take out its 
> engines then it'll crash.  Hopefully it won't crash in range of the 
mountain. 
>  If it does we'll have to disable it's weapons.  Permanently."
